org.lafayette.server.domain

Interface UserFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserMapper

    public interface UserFinder
    Domain facade to obtain users from persistent data storage.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

        Find user by it's id.

        Returns:

        Collection<User> findAll(int limit,
                       int offset)
        Find all users.
        Parameters:
        limit - maxim amount of users
        offset - offset of roles
        Returns:
        never null, but maybe empty collection
